com.facebook.buck.codegen

Class SourceSigner

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.codegen.SourceSigner

  • public class SourceSigner
extends Object
    Designates machine-generated code so tools can distinguish it from human-generated code, and prevent manual edits of machine-generated code by embedding a simple checksum in generated source files.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  SourceSigner.SignatureStatus 

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String SIGNED_SOURCE_PLACEHOLDER
      When generating a new file to be signed, include this placeholder somewhere inside the contents of the file, then pass it to sign(String) to sign the contents.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static SourceSigner.SignatureStatus getSignatureStatus(String source)
      Given the contents of a source file, checks if a signature is present, and if so, checks if the signature is valid.
      static Optional<String> sign(String source)
      Given the contents of a source file containing 0 or more existing signatures or signature placeholders, calculates an updated signature and updates the signatures in the source file.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • SIGNED_SOURCE_PLACEHOLDER

        public static final String SIGNED_SOURCE_PLACEHOLDER
        When generating a new file to be signed, include this placeholder somewhere inside the contents of the file, then pass it to sign(String) to sign the contents.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • getSignatureStatus

        public static final SourceSigner.SignatureStatus getSignatureStatus(String source)
        Given the contents of a source file, checks if a signature is present, and if so, checks if the signature is valid.

      • sign

        public static final Optional<String> sign(String source)
        Given the contents of a source file containing 0 or more existing signatures or signature placeholders, calculates an updated signature and updates the signatures in the source file. If the source file contains at least one signature, returns an Optional containing the updated source file. Otherwise, returns Optional.absent().
